title: I want to create an American idol-type show for my fictional novel. Can I use names of real songs in it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. Shortest answer ever. hmm it does get a bit blurry the more you want to include. For example full sheet music you absolutely need permission. but you are most likely going to have a few key lyrics and the titles. That’s nothing to worry about. As a side note this is why some books need drastic changes in order to become movies.
The titles of songs. Yes. Just don’t diss them or cause them harm. It must be positive.
